Rest and relaxation: Get plenty of rest and avoid overexertion. This can help your body recover faster.
Use a humidifier: Dry air can exacerbate cold symptoms, so using a humidifier can help to relieve congestion.
Gargle with salt water: Gargling with warm salt water can help soothe a sore throat and reduce inflammation.
Use a neti pot: A neti pot can help to clear your nasal passages and relieve congestion.
Practice good hygiene: Wash your hands frequently, avoid touching your face, and use tissues to cover your mouth and nose when you cough or sneeze.
